>
[Remorseless Lash](/Feats.aspx?ID=5573) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 14 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You're skilled at beating an enemy when their morale is already breaking. When you succeed at a melee weapon Strike against a [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) enemy, that enemy can't reduce their frightened condition below 1 until the beginning of your next turn.
